text:
And now
👇
#BioNTech Founder Vaults Into World’s Richest on 250% Surge
The co-founder of BioNTech SE on Thursday joined the world’s 500 richest people after the U.K. this week approved use of a #COVID19  #vaccine that the German firm created w/ #PfizerInc
